backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, timetable CRUD, and payment settings with access control checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that initializes empty maps and default payment settings for upgrading actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router setup with all public and admin routes wrapped in session guards and shared layout.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Renders an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with header, back button, logout, and footer around page content.
frontend/src/components/RequireSession.t: Session guard component that redirects unauthenticated users and shows a loading state during initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSession.ts: Implements simple name/password session storage in localStorage with login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentSettings.ts: Fetches and updates payment settings through the backend actor, converting between backend and UPI formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimetable.ts: Loads and saves timetable lessons via the backend actor, handling time parsing and formatting.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with custom theme variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentSettings: Admin-only page to view and update UPI payment settings with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/TimetableEditor: Admin-only timetable editor that loads entries, allows adding/removing/editing rows, validates fields, and saves via mutation. Includes admin check and UI for managing schedule data.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Renders a static announcements list with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactTeacherPage.ts: Provides a WhatsApp contact button with fallback handling if the window cannot open.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login form that stores name/password in local session and redirects to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Displays a list of notes and shows a toast saying the file is unavailable when clicked.
frontend/src/pages/PayFeesPage.tsx: Handles UPI fee payments with amount validation, UPI link generation, and fallback behavior.
Renders student dashboard with navigation cards linking to major app sections.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherAdminPage.tsx: Provides admin action buttons for teachers, with some features disabled as coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/TimetablePage.tsx: Fetches and displays the class timetable with colored schedule cards and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters (including hash), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and clearing them for persisted state like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, container settings, animations, and theme tokens for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, existing features, architecture notes, and planned behavior for the tuition classes app.
